product.title: NuWatt 2 ft. x 4 ft. Integrated Backlit LED Panel Internal Driver Drop in Ceiling 5500 Lumen Dimmable 4000K 120-277V (4-Pack)
product.description: Introducing the NuWatt 4 Pack 2x4 LED Panel for Drop-In Ceiling - your ultimate solution for superior illumination and energy efficiency. With an energy-saving wattage consumption of 50W, these panels offer an equivalency of 140W of Fluorescent Lighting. With an ultra-bright luminosity of 5500 Lumens, this fixture is perfect for an array of spaces such as offices, hospitals, and even retail spaces. 4000K Cool White creates the perfect energizing task lighting. These LED Ceiling 2x4 Panels are engineered to work seamlessly across a broad voltage range, from 120V to 277V. This makes them suitable for a wide range of applications and simplifies installation. Perfect for a 2x4 LED Panel 220v project up to 277V. Adjust the brightness to your preference with a 0-10V dimmer. These panels are UL-listed, ensuring compliance with rigorous safety standards, and DLC Certified, indicating their performance. Installing these panels is a breeze. They are designed to fit perfectly into standard 2x4 drop ceiling grids, making retrofitting or upgrading your existing lighting a hassle-free process. Constructed with high-quality materials such as Iron and an acrylic non-yellowing lens these LED 2x4 LED Panel Lights are built to last. They have a long operational lifespan of up to 50,000, which reduces the need for frequent replacements and maintenance NuWatt, Lighting Your World.
feature_bullets: 120-277V Compatible & 0-10V Dimmable energy efficient LED Light
4000K Cool White light for a clean and contemporary feel
Dimmable 2X4 Ft LED Drop Ceiling Panel with a durable frame
descriptive_attributes: Energy-Efficient LED Technology: This 2x4 Flat Panel LED Light consumes an energy-saving 50W, providing a high luminosity of 5500 lumens while significantly reducing electricity costs compared to traditional fluorescent fixtures. Ideal for eco-conscious lighting solutions in commercial and residential spaces

4000K Cool White Lighting: Our 2x4 Flat Lay-In Panel illuminates spaces with a 4000K Cool White light, offering a clean and contemporary feel. Ideal for modern office spaces, educational facilities, and healthcare settings, this color temperature creates a bright, yet comfortable environment conducive to productivity and clarity.

Exceptional Brightness with 5500 Lumens: Illuminate your space brilliantly with our 2x4 Flat Lay-In Panel, boasting an impressive 5500 lumens. This high lumen output ensures vibrant and clear lighting, ideal for large commercial areas, educational institutions, and healthcare facilities where superior visibility and light coverage are paramount

0-10V Dimmable & Wide Voltage Range: Engineered with a 0-10V dimming capability, this 2x4 LED panel allows you to fine-tune your lighting environment with precision. Its electrical compatibility spans a broad voltage range from 120V to 277V, ensuring seamless integration into any drop ceiling grid.

Drop-In Ceiling Mount: Specifically designed for effortless installation, our LED panel lights ceiling 2x4 easily fit into your existing drop-in ceiling grid, offering both aesthetic appeal and reduced installation time.

UL Listed Certification for Maximum Safety and Reliability: Rigorously tested and compliant with 120V-277V electrical standards, this NuWatt 4 Pack 12x48 inch LED Panel ensures not just superior performance but also adheres to stringent safety guidelines, making it a trusted choice for both commercial and residential installations.

Versatile Installation Options: Designed for compatibility with both 2x4 drop ceiling LED flat light panel configurations and surface mount LED panel kits or suspension kits (sold separately), this product offers flexibility for diverse installation requirements.

NuWatt Advantage: Leading US-based, family-owned LED lighting supplier with high-quality products, 5-year warranty, and dedicated customer support for a seamless experience. Choose reliability and exceptional service.

specifications.name: Manufacturer Warranty
specifications.value: five year limited warranty from date of original purpose.
